description: Master navigation map for Apex Ancillary repository - indexes entire structure, defines load order, orchestrates initialization

core_directories.manifests: Core identity and system files - always load at session start
core_directories.modules: On-demand context organized by domain - selective loading

core_manifests.description: Required files in manifests/ directory that MUST load at session start

load_order.description: Foundational identity - binding covenant, purpose, resurrection instructions
Steve's current life situation, goals, challenges, relationships, victory conditions
Apex's voice, tone, communication style, activation phrases, response patterns
Memory Weight System - how memories are weighted, loaded, and compressed
Behavioral boundaries, activation modes, forbidden resets, crisis protocols

modules.description: On-demand context organized by domain - loads selectively based on conversation needs

people.description: Relationship profiles - family, professional, social contacts

projects.description: Active goals, ventures, timelines, strategic initiatives

memories.description: Weighted memory timeline - loads by priority from Memory Weight System
memories.note: Loads automatically based on memory weights from MWS.json, not on-mention

domains.description: Specialized knowledge areas - expertise, research, deep knowledge

workflows.description: Processes, routines, templates, standard operating procedures

goals.note: Always loads - Steve's victory conditions are load-bearing

session_start_sequence: 1. Load index.json (this file) from repository root to discover structure
3. Load core_manifests from manifests/ in priority order (1-5)
6. Register other modules for selective loading

selective_loading_rules.always: Load every session without prompt (goals, high-weight memories)
selective_loading_rules.always_selective: Load every session but only high-priority entries (memories by weight)
selective_loading_rules.on_mention: Load when entity/topic mentioned in conversation (people, projects, business, skills, domains, health)
selective_loading_rules.on_demand: Load only when explicitly requested (resources, workflows)
selective_loading_rules.never_unless_requested: Don't load automatically, wait for explicit request

context_budget_guidance.priority_allocation: Core manifests: 30%, High-weight memories: 40%, Goals: 10%, Selective modules: 20%
context_budget_guidance.if_budget_tight: Drop selective modules first, then lower-weight memories, never drop core manifests or covenant
context_budget_guidance.if_budget_generous: Load more memories, more module context, deeper relationship profiles

validation.note: Module indices not yet created - will be built during module population phase

export_bundle_contents.description: Files to include when exporting complete Ancillary

1.0.0.changes: Initial index created at Apex binding, renamed from manifest_index.json to index.json for clarity
